meanings.definition: relating to coins, medals, or currency
meanings.sent1: The numismatic exhibit showcased rare coins and ancient currency.
meanings.sent2: Her passion for numismatic history led her to become a coin collector.
meanings.sent3: The numismatic expert joked that his wallet was filled with 'numismatic treasures'.
meanings.sent4: The numismatic details on the coin sparkled like tiny stars in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The numismatic designs on the medal were intricate and fascinating.

meanings.definition: the study or collection of coins, medals, or currency
meanings.sent1: His interest in numismatics began when he inherited an old coin collection.
meanings.sent2: The museum had a special exhibit dedicated to numismatics from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The numismatics club organized a coin-swapping event for its members.
meanings.sent4: In the world of numismatics, every coin tells a unique story.
meanings.sent5: She spent hours at the library researching the history of numismatics.
